>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: INVALID PROPERTY CARDINALITY

id:: td-000079

######################################################################

This test data file illustrates an entity with invalid property
cardinality.  Specifically, it contains a problem entity with more
than one title element.

>>>problem

title:: This is problem 1

title:: This is a 2nd title that shouldn't be here

title:: This is a 3rd title that shouldn't be here

label:: problem-1

type:: technical

description:: There is no problem with problem 1.

<<<problem

<<<DOCUMENT
